hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Ch: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #4# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Switch Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #Saria's Song#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Zora Tunic# and #a Goron Tunic#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
